scripts.diagrams:svg: mmdc -p node_modules/puppeteer/.local-chromium/*/chrome-win/chrome.exe -i docs/diagrams/system-design.mmd -o docs/diagrams/system-design.svg && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/use-case.mmd -o docs/diagrams/use-case.svg && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/er.mmd -o docs/diagrams/er.svg && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/dfd-level-0.mmd -o docs/diagrams/dfd-level-0.svg && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/dfd-level-1.mmd -o docs/diagrams/dfd-level-1.svg && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/dfd-level-2.mmd -o docs/diagrams/dfd-level-2.svg && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/activity-login.mmd -o docs/diagrams/activity-login.svg && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/activity-enrollment.mmd -o docs/diagrams/activity-enrollment.svg && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/architecture.mmd -o docs/diagrams/architecture.svg
scripts.diagrams:png: mmdc -i docs/diagrams/system-design.mmd -o docs/diagrams/system-design.png && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/use-case.mmd -o docs/diagrams/use-case.png && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/er.mmd -o docs/diagrams/er.png && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/dfd-level-0.mmd -o docs/diagrams/dfd-level-0.png && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/dfd-level-1.mmd -o docs/diagrams/dfd-level-1.png && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/dfd-level-2.mmd -o docs/diagrams/dfd-level-2.png && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/activity-login.mmd -o docs/diagrams/activity-login.png && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/activity-enrollment.mmd -o docs/diagrams/activity-enrollment.png && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/architecture.mmd -o docs/diagrams/architecture.png
